title: Migration DB from Stable (v1.76.20) to Nightly (v1.77.3.1784-NB)
author: mlakatamitis
body_snippet:
Hi all,

I have installed the Stable version and i want to update to Nightly but i have issue with the DB. 
Is there any way to migrate my database from the stable version to the Nightly version?


## Your Environment
Windows

comments.snippet: Just export config (csv or xml) and import in updated version.
comments.author: JustBeta

comments.snippet: Just export... But what to do if winget updated the application automatically and now the data is not available, when rolling back to the old version, there is not a single saved login and password, moreover, even the settings for connections, all inheritances have flown off. Now go and configure each folder and connection from scratch...
